executionArgs.additionalInstruction:
Focus tests on:
1) Home page header contains Calculators dropdown populated via API/Factory and links are valid.
2) Visiting /calculator/civil shows a grid of calculators with links to /calculator/civil/<slug>.
3) Visiting a tool URL renders breadcrumb and an Open Module button.
4) Admin login (mock or bypass if not available), visit /admin/themes, click Customize, change primary color, save, and verify CSS variables on reload reflect new value.
5) Basic smoke: /api/v1/health returns JSON with success and active theme info.
If login is required for admin pages and credentials are unknown, stub/bypass by setting a session or mocking auth middleware if supported by the environment.
Use robust selectors (by text and roles) and tolerate minor layout differences.
